job_tasks.phrase: design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building backend systems and integrating AI models, which falls under traditional software development and integration.
Developing cloud-native services is a fundamental software engineering task related to building and deploying applications in a cloud environment.
Streamlining CI/CD pipelines is a key aspect of MLOps/DevOps, focusing on the automation of software delivery and deployment.
Ensuring system security and reliability are core responsibilities of software engineers focused on production-grade systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes traditional software development tasks related to building and maintaining backend systems and APIs.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices
job_tasks.justification: Refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security are all standard software engineering practices for ensuring system quality.

job_tasks.phrase: Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions streamlining DevOps workflows and improving CI/CD pipelines, which falls under the MLOps/DevOps category.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on a technical roadmap and driving innovation involves understanding business strategy and translating it into technical direction.

soft_skills.phrase: Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a need for collaboration with other technical teams.

soft_skills.phrase: working with the CTO and engineering team
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need to collaborate with leadership and the broader engineering team.
This phrase indicates a need for proactive contribution and driving new ideas.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as developing backend services, cloud infrastructure, REST APIs, CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring system reliability and security. While it mentions integrating AI models into customer workflows and working with ML engineers, the core responsibilities and tasks described fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). There are no specific tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it builds software that integrates AI but does not focus on the AI model development itself.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed regarding the software engineering responsibilities. The distinction between building the platform that integrates AI and developing the AI models themselves is well-defined by the tasks listed. There is no ambiguity in the core focus of the role.
